lead_paragraph: In the year 2029, John Connor leads the human resistance against artificial intelligence system Skynet. Connor sends soldier Kyle Reese back to 1984 to save Connor's mother from a Terminator sent to kill her before giving birth to her son. But what Reese finds in the past is not what he expected.
